3 LineFollower::LineFollower(int image_height, int image_width, LineFollowerInitializationParameters init):
4 kImageWidth_(image_width),
5 kImageHeight_(image_height),
6 kMaxIterations_(init.max_iterations),
7 kSearchRadius_(init.search_radius),
8 kMaxWeightDirectionScaler_(init.max_weight_direction_scaler),
9 kFieldOfView_(init.field_of_view),
10 kMaxConsecutiveBackSteps_(init.max_consecutive_back_steps),
11 kMinTravelDistanceToNotGotStuck_(init.min_travel_distance_to_not_got_stuck),
12 kMaxGotStuckCounts_(init.max_got_stuck_counts),
13 kStartAngleFieldOfView_((kFieldOfView_/2 ) * (PI/180)),
14 kEndAngleFieldOfView_((kFieldOfView_/2 ) * (PI/180) - 0.001),
15 kStepFieldOfView_((kFieldOfView_/ 4) * (PI/180))
16 {

27 void LineFollower::SetStartParameters(StartParameters start_parameters)
28 {
29  start_left_x_ = start_parameters.left_x;
30  start_left_y_ = start_parameters.left_y;
31  start_angle_left_ = start_parameters.left_angle * (PI/180);
32  found_left_line_ = start_parameters.found_left_line;
33 
34  start_right_x_ = start_parameters.right_x;
35  start_right_y_ = start_parameters.right_y;
36  start_angle_right_ = start_parameters.right_angle * (PI/180);
37  found_right_line_ = start_parameters.found_right_line;
38 }

41 void LineFollower::ClearMemory()
42 {
43  left_line_max_iterations_exceeded_ = false;
44  left_line_search_radius_out_of_image_= false;
45  left_line_has_got_stuck_= false;
46  left_line_is_walking_backwards_= false;
47  left_line_iterations_counter_ = 0;
48  left_line_got_stuck_counter_ = 0;
49  left_line_walked_backwards_counter_ = 0;
50 
51  right_line_max_iterations_exceeded_= false;
52  right_line_search_radius_out_of_image_= false;
53  right_line_has_got_stuck_= false;
54  right_line_is_walking_backwards_= false;
55  right_line_iterations_counter_ = 0;
56  right_line_got_stuck_counter_ = 0;
57  right_line_walked_backwards_counter_ = 0;
58 
59  left_line_points_and_directions_.clear();
60  right_line_points_and_directions_.clear();
61 
62  found_left_line_ = false;
63  found_right_line_ = false;
64 
65 }

81 int LineFollower::FollowLine(int x, int y, float search_direction, int line)
82 {
83  if(MaxIterationsExceeded(line) || SearchRadiusIsNotInImage(x, y, line)){ return 0; }
84 
85  SetSearchDirectionParameters(search_direction);
86 
87  int otsu_threshold = GetOtsuThreshold(x, y);
88 
89  vector<ScannedMoments> scanned_moments = GetScannedMoments(otsu_threshold, x, y);
90 
91  Point center_of_gravity = GetCenterOfGravity(x, y, scanned_moments);
92 
93  Point new_start_point = ChangeToBrightestCoordinateWithinReach(center_of_gravity);
94 
95  float new_angle = GetNewAngle(x, y, new_start_point);
96 
97  if(HasGotStuck(x,y,new_start_point,line) || IsWalkingBackwards(y,new_start_point,line)){ return 0; }
98 
99  AddIteration(new_start_point, new_angle, line);
100 
101  FollowLine(new_start_point.x, new_start_point.y, new_angle, line);
102 
103  //TODO: check if angle may change only a little is better
104  //############################
105  /*
106  if( new_angle > (search_direction+kMaxChangeInDegreePerIteration_* PI/180) || new_angle < (search_direction-kMaxChangeInDegreePerIteration_* PI/180) )
107  {
108  //cout << "an " << new_angle*180/PI << " " << search_direction*180/PI << " " << search_direction*180/PI+kMaxChangeInDegreePerIteration_ <<
109  // " " << search_direction*180/PI-kMaxChangeInDegreePerIteration_ << endl;
110  new_angle = search_direction;
111  }
112  */
113  //####################
114 
115 
116 
117 }

120 
121 Point LineFollower::GetPolarCoordinate(int x, int y, float angle, int radius)
122 {
123  x = x + radius * cos(angle) + 0.5;
124  y = y - radius * sin(angle) + 0.5;
125 
126  return Point(x,y);
127 }
128 
129 Point LineFollower::ChangeToBrightestCoordinateWithinReach(Point center_of_gravity)
130 {
131 
132  int x = center_of_gravity.x;
133  int y = center_of_gravity.y;
134 
135  int left = GetPixelValue(Point(x-1,y));
136  int right = GetPixelValue(Point(x+1,y));
137  int mid = GetPixelValue(Point(x,y));
138  int top = GetPixelValue(Point(x,y-1));
139  int bottom = GetPixelValue(Point(x,y+1));
140 
141  int intensities[] = {left,right,mid,top,bottom};
142 
143  int max_id = distance(intensities, max_element(intensities, intensities+5));
144 
145  switch(max_id)
146  {
147  case 0:
148  return Point(x-1,y);
149  break;
150  case 1:
151  return Point(x+1,y);
152  break;
153  case 2:
154  return Point(x,y);
155  break;
156  case 3:
157  return Point(x,y-1);
158  break;
159  case 4:
160  return Point(x,y+1);
161  break;
162  default:
163  cout << "something went wrong??" << endl;
164  return Point(x,y);
165  break;
166  }
167 
168 }
169 
170 int LineFollower::GetPixelValue(Point point)
171 {
172  return (int)image_.at<uchar>(point);
173 }
174 
175 
176 vector<int> LineFollower::ScanIntensitiesInSearchDirection(int x, int y)
177 {
178  vector<int> scanned_intensities;
179 
180  for (float angle=start_of_search_; angle>=end_of_search_; angle-=kStepFieldOfView_)
181  {
182  for (int current_search_radius=0; current_search_radius<kSearchRadius_; current_search_radius++)
183  {
184  Point current_point = GetPolarCoordinate(x,y,angle,current_search_radius);
185  int intensity = GetPixelValue(current_point);
186  scanned_intensities.push_back(intensity);
187  }
188  }
189 
190  return scanned_intensities;
191 }
192 
193 
194 int LineFollower::GetOtsuThreshold(int x, int y)
195 {
196  vector<int> scanned_intensities = ScanIntensitiesInSearchDirection(x,y);
197 
198  Mat scanned_intensities_mat( 1,scanned_intensities.size(), CV_32SC1,scanned_intensities.data());
199  scanned_intensities_mat.convertTo(scanned_intensities_mat, CV_8UC1);
200 
201  int otsu_threshold = threshold(scanned_intensities_mat, scanned_intensities_mat, 0, 255, CV_THRESH_BINARY | CV_THRESH_OTSU);
202 
203  return otsu_threshold;
204 }
205 
206 vector<ScannedMoments> LineFollower::GetScannedMoments(int otsu_threshold, int x, int y)
207 {
208  vector<ScannedMoments> scanned_moments;
209 
210  for (float angle=start_of_search_; angle>=end_of_search_; angle-=kStepFieldOfView_)
211  {
212  int intensity_sum = 0;
213  bool scan_terminated = false;
214 
215 
216  for (int current_search_radius=0; current_search_radius<kSearchRadius_; current_search_radius++)
217  {
218  Point current_point = GetPolarCoordinate(x,y,angle,current_search_radius);
219  int intensity = GetPixelValue(current_point);
220 
221 
222 
223  if(intensity <= otsu_threshold)
224  {
225  Point current_point = GetPolarCoordinate(x,y,angle,current_search_radius-1);
226  scanned_moments.push_back(ScannedMoments{current_point.x,current_point.y,intensity_sum});
227  scan_terminated = true;
228  break;
229  }
230 
231  intensity_sum += intensity;
232 
233  }
234 
235  if(!scan_terminated)
236  {
237  Point current_point = GetPolarCoordinate(x,y,angle,kSearchRadius_-1);
238  scanned_moments.push_back(ScannedMoments{current_point.x,current_point.y,intensity_sum});
239  }
240  }
241 
242  return scanned_moments;
243 }

249 void LineFollower::CoutReturnInfo()
250 {
251  LineFollowerReturnInfo info = GetReturnInfo();
252 
253  cout << "___LineFollow ReturnInfo___" << endl;
254  cout << "LEFT: " << endl;
255  cout << "max it: \t\t" <<std::boolalpha <<info.left_line_max_iterations_exceeded << endl;
256  cout << "out range: \t\t" <<std::boolalpha << info.left_line_search_radius_out_of_image << endl;
257  cout << "has got stuck: \t\t" << std::boolalpha << info.left_line_has_got_stuck << endl;
258  cout << "walked backwards: \t" << std::boolalpha << info.left_line_is_walking_backwards << endl;
259  cout << "it count: \t\t" << info.left_line_iterations_counter << endl;
260  cout << "got stuck count: \t" << info.left_line_got_stuck_counter << endl;
261  cout << "walked backwards count: " << info.left_line_walked_backwards_counter << endl<< endl;
262 
263  cout << "RIGHT: " << endl;
264  cout << "max it: \t\t" <<std::boolalpha <<info.right_line_max_iterations_exceeded << endl;
265  cout << "out range: \t\t" <<std::boolalpha << info.right_line_search_radius_out_of_image << endl;
266  cout << "has got stuck: \t\t" << std::boolalpha << info.right_line_has_got_stuck << endl;
267  cout << "walked backwards: \t" << std::boolalpha << info.right_line_is_walking_backwards << endl;
268  cout << "it count: \t\t" << info.right_line_iterations_counter << endl;
269  cout << "got stuck count: \t" << info.right_line_got_stuck_counter << endl;
270  cout << "walked backwards count: " << info.right_line_walked_backwards_counter << endl;
271  cout << "#######################################" << endl;
272 
273 }

275 
276 void LineFollower::SearchMaxWeightMoment(SummedMoments &summed_moments, vector<ScannedMoments> scanned_moments)
277 {
278  for (int id=0; id<scanned_moments.size(); id++)
279  {
280  if(summed_moments.max_weight < scanned_moments[id].intensity_sum)
281  {
282  summed_moments.max_weight = scanned_moments[id].intensity_sum;
283  summed_moments.max_weight_id = id;
284  }
285  }
286 }
287 
288 void LineFollower::SumUpMoments(SummedMoments &summed_moments, vector<ScannedMoments> scanned_moments)
289 {
290  for (int id=0; id<scanned_moments.size(); id++)
291  {
292  int weight = scanned_moments[id].intensity_sum;
293  int x = scanned_moments[id].x;
294  int y = scanned_moments[id].y;
295 
296  if(id == summed_moments.max_weight_id) weight *= kMaxWeightDirectionScaler_;
297 
298  summed_moments.moment_weight += weight;
299  summed_moments.moment_x += weight * x;
300  summed_moments.moment_y += weight * y;
301  }
302 }
303 
304 
305 Point LineFollower::GetCenterOfGravity(int x, int y, vector<ScannedMoments> scanned_moments)
306 {
307 
308  SummedMoments summed_moments = {};
309 
310  SearchMaxWeightMoment(summed_moments, scanned_moments);
311  SumUpMoments(summed_moments, scanned_moments);
312 
313  int center_of_gravity_x = 0;
314  int center_of_gravity_y = 0;
315 
316  // TODO: when zero weight found there are no pixels so break out of loop ?
317  if(summed_moments.moment_weight <= 0)
318  {
319  center_of_gravity_x = x;
320  center_of_gravity_y = y;
321  }
322  else
323  {
324  center_of_gravity_x = summed_moments.moment_x / summed_moments.moment_weight;
325  center_of_gravity_y = summed_moments.moment_y / summed_moments.moment_weight;
326  }
327 
328  return Point(center_of_gravity_x,center_of_gravity_y);
329 
330 }
331 
332 float LineFollower::GetNewAngle(int x, int y, Point new_start_point)
333 {
334 
335  int opposite = y - new_start_point.y;
336  int adjacent = new_start_point.x - x;
337 
338  return CalculateAngle4Quadrants(opposite, adjacent) * PI/180;
339 }
340 
341 
342 bool LineFollower::MaxIterationsExceeded(int line)
343 {
344  if(iterations_counter_ >= kMaxIterations_)
345  {
346  if(line == LEFT_LINE) left_line_max_iterations_exceeded_ = true;
347  if(line == RIGHT_LINE) right_line_max_iterations_exceeded_ = true;
348 
349  return true;
350  }
351  else
352  {
353  return false;
354  }
355 }
356 
357 bool LineFollower::SearchRadiusIsNotInImage(int x, int y, int line)
358 {
359  if(x < kSearchRadius_ || y < kSearchRadius_ ||(kImageWidth_ - kSearchRadius_) < x || (kImageHeight_ - kSearchRadius_) < y)
360  {
361  if(line == LEFT_LINE) left_line_search_radius_out_of_image_ = true;
362  if(line == RIGHT_LINE) right_line_search_radius_out_of_image_ = true;
363 
364  return true;
365  }
366  else
367  {
368  return false;
369  }
370 
371 }
372 
373 
374 void LineFollower::SetSearchDirectionParameters(float search_direction)
375 {
376  start_of_search_ = search_direction + kStartAngleFieldOfView_;
377  end_of_search_ = search_direction - kEndAngleFieldOfView_;
378 }
379 
380 bool LineFollower::IsWalkingBackwards(int y, Point new_start_point, int line)
381 {
382  if(new_start_point.y > y)
383  {
384  walked_backwards_counter_++;
385  }
386  else {
387  walked_backwards_counter_ = 0;
388  }
389 
390  if(walked_backwards_counter_ > kMaxConsecutiveBackSteps_)
391  {
392  if(line == LEFT_LINE) left_line_is_walking_backwards_ = true;
393  if(line == RIGHT_LINE) right_line_is_walking_backwards_ = true;
394 
395  return true;
396  }
397  else {
398  return false;
399  }
400 
401 }
402 
403 bool LineFollower::HasGotStuck(int x, int y, Point new_start_point, int line)
404 {
405  int distance = sqrt(pow(x-new_start_point.x,2) + pow(y -new_start_point.y,2));
406 
407  if(distance < kMinTravelDistanceToNotGotStuck_)
408  {
409  got_stuck_counter_++;
410  }
411  else {
412 
413  got_stuck_counter_ = 0;
414  }
415 
416  if(got_stuck_counter_>kMaxGotStuckCounts_){
417 
418  if(line == LEFT_LINE) left_line_has_got_stuck_ = true;
419  if(line == RIGHT_LINE) right_line_has_got_stuck_ = true;
420 
421  return true;
422  }
423  else {
424  return false;
425  }
426 }
427 
428 
429 void LineFollower::AddIteration(Point new_start_point, float new_angle, int line)
430 {
431  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
432  left_line_points_and_directions_.push_back(PointAndDirection{new_start_point.x,new_start_point.y,new_angle});
433 
434  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
435  right_line_points_and_directions_.push_back(PointAndDirection{new_start_point.x,new_start_point.y,new_angle});
436 
437  iterations_counter_++;
438 }
439 
440 
441 void LineFollower::DrawLinePoints(Mat &rgb, int line)
442 {
443  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
444  {
445  for(auto &it : left_line_points_and_directions_)
446  {
447  circle(rgb, Point(it.x,it.y), 7, Scalar(0, 255, 255));
448  }
449  }
450 
451  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
452  {
453  for(auto &it : right_line_points_and_directions_)
454  {
455  circle(rgb, Point(it.x,it.y), 7, Scalar(255, 255, 0));
456  }
457  }
458 }

461 void LineFollower::SaveCounterValuesToReturnInfo(int line)
462 {
463  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
464  {
465  left_line_iterations_counter_ = iterations_counter_;
466  left_line_got_stuck_counter_ = got_stuck_counter_;
467  left_line_walked_backwards_counter_ = walked_backwards_counter_;
468  }
469 
470  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
471  {
472  right_line_iterations_counter_ = iterations_counter_;
473  right_line_got_stuck_counter_ = got_stuck_counter_;
474  right_line_walked_backwards_counter_ = walked_backwards_counter_;
475  }
476 }

479 LineFollowerReturnInfo LineFollower::GetReturnInfo()
480 {
481  return LineFollowerReturnInfo{ left_line_max_iterations_exceeded_,
482  left_line_search_radius_out_of_image_,
483  left_line_has_got_stuck_,
484  left_line_is_walking_backwards_,
485  left_line_iterations_counter_,
486  left_line_got_stuck_counter_,
487  left_line_walked_backwards_counter_,
488  right_line_max_iterations_exceeded_,
489  right_line_search_radius_out_of_image_,
490  right_line_has_got_stuck_,
491  right_line_is_walking_backwards_,
492  right_line_iterations_counter_,
493  right_line_got_stuck_counter_,
494  right_line_walked_backwards_counter_};
495 }
496 
497 LineFollowerReturnInfo LineFollower::FollowLines(Mat image, StartParameters start_parameters)
498 {
499 
500  SetImage(image);
501  ClearMemory();
502  SetStartParameters(start_parameters);
503 
504 
505 
506  ResetCounters();
507 
508  if(found_left_line_)
509  {
510  FollowLine(start_left_x_, start_left_y_, start_angle_left_, LEFT_LINE);
511  }
512  SaveCounterValuesToReturnInfo(LEFT_LINE);
513 
514  ResetCounters();
515 
516  if(found_right_line_)
517  {
518  FollowLine(start_right_x_, start_right_y_, start_angle_right_, RIGHT_LINE);
519  }
520  SaveCounterValuesToReturnInfo(RIGHT_LINE);
521 
522 
523  return GetReturnInfo();
524 }
525

527 {
528  if(line == LEFT_LINE)
529  {
530  _line = left_line_points_and_directions_;
531  }
532 
533  if(line == RIGHT_LINE)
534  {
535  _line = right_line_points_and_directions_;
536  }
537 }
